name: Late Night Shopping
description:
An atmospheric infinite runner. Can you escape the darkness? Use the arrow keys to evade. If you get hit too many times, you will die.

WARNING: This game is VERY unoptimized. It is in desperate need of some object pooling, baked lighting, and an option to disable post processing. I was not able to get these done in time. 

Tools used: 

Unity3D, GIMP,  Audacity, and Jukedeck

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com

This game was made for Ludum Dare 41. 

Rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/late-night-shopping
